description: Set the default version of a document.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of a custom document that you want to set as the default version.

parameters.name: DocumentVersion
parameters.description: The version of a custom document that you want to set as the default version.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of a custom document that you want to set as the default version.

nested_items.name: DefaultVersion
nested_items.description: The default version of the document.

nested_items.name: DefaultVersionName
nested_items.description: The default version of the artifact associated with the document.
